title: A ghost writer, Trump Meredith McKeffer, isn't there?
subtitle: When the phantom writer Donald Trump Meredith McIver appeared to be responsible for the alleged theft of Melania Trump, some viewers questioned her existence.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: The Donald Trump campaign was invented by a fictional writer named Meredith McKeffer for heat after Melania Trump was criticized for stealing the 2008 Michel Obama conference speech.
